name: extended_response_test1
title: Extended Response Test 1
intro_text:
Extended Response

Welcome to the Writing Extended Response Practice Test.

You have 45 minutes to complete the Extended Response essay. The goal is to give you practice on the types of questions you will see on the GED® test and to give you a study plan for what you need to brush up on for the test.

The Extended Response essay will be evaluated on following three areas:

  1. How well the essay evaluates the arguments in the passages and then creates a logical argument that uses good supporting evidence.
  2. How well the essay logically develops ideas with relevant ideas and how well it is organized to communicate your message and purpose.
  3. How well the essay follows the Standard English Conventions of spelling, word choice, punctuation, sentence structure and the English language mechanics.

Your Extended Response will be scored by our staff of teachers within 72 hours.
